messages.content: Good afternoon! How can I assist you today?
Write me a poem on the pain of setting up python development environment

The python development environment is a tale

Of frustration and pain, it's a maelstrom
Installing the software, it's a chore
Navigating the setup, it's a bore

You try to follow the instructions
But the code keeps crashing and the path keeps confining
You're lost in the world of terminals and commands
And your productivity drops like a bomb

But you press on, you persevere
Through the pain of setup and configuring
You know that in the end, it'll be worth the while
To have a python development environment that's alive

So you keep on trucking, through the pain of it all
For the sake of your dreams and your projects to call
And one day, you'll have a setup that's running smooth
And you'll know that all the pain was worth the booth.
